# 奇门枢要

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qimen-shuyao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qimen-shuyao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qimen-shuyao
qimen-shuyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qimen-shuyao
qimen-shuyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
